code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{modifyRule}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RuleModifier=()=>{const[ruleId,setRuleId]=useState('');const[path,setPath]=useState('');const[newValue,setNewValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const pathArray=path.split('.').filter(Boolean);await modifyRule(ruleId,pathArray,newValue);alert('Rule modified successfully!');}catch(error){alert('Error modifying rule: '+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:ruleId,onChange:e=>setRuleId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Rule ID",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:path,onChange:e=>setPath(e.target.value),placeholder:"Path (e.g., left.right.value)",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newValue,onChange:e=>setNewValue(e.target.value),placeholder:"New Value",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Modify Rule"})]});};export default RuleModifier;
